Class ScorecardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Scorecard
      • ScorecardView

  • public class ScorecardView
extends Scorecard
    Class Scorecard: acts as the GUI Scorecard view for the scorecard class Attributes: private ArrayList upperViewLabels private ArrayList lowerViewLabels private ArrayList upperViewOptions private ArrayList lowerViewOptions private ArrayList upperScores private ArrayList lowerScores private YahtzeeGUI currGame; publicMethods: initialHand changeUpperViewOptions changeLowerViewOptions getUpperViewLabels getLowerViewLabels getUpperViewOptions getLowerViewOptions printGUIScorecard setUpperScores setLowerScores checkEndGame

    v1.0 03/23/21
    Author:

    See Also:
